: : Kup : :
Kup could not move at this time. He could only mumble sounds at Windlord.
Kup: Mmm...arrgg...
Kup was trying to tell him to go after Flicker and Nightlight. He relaxed a bit as he saw Owlhawk take off after them. At least someone was continuing the persuit.
Kup then thinks about Condor. He knows that Condor had taken some direct fire from Flicker. Then Yggdrasil comes over the comm, confirming the worst.
That Predacon bastard had killed Condor.
 airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:Windlord:

Windlord saw the conmotion down then he landed and saw his friend 
Kup pretty bad "Kup, KUP... WHAT'S UP WHAT'S GOING ON????" and 
looking to Battera said "Who're you? what's your faction? and 
whatdid happen him???"






--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "raccoon7679" <raccoon7679@y...>
